definitions.definition: The molten matter within the earth, the source of the material of lava flows, dikes of eruptive rocks, etc.
A basic algebraic structure consisting of a set equipped with a single binary operation .
The residuum after expressing the juice from fruits .

main_definition: ( geology ) The molten matter within the earth, the source of the material of lava flows, dikes of eruptive rocks, etc.
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) A basic algebraic structure consisting of a set equipped with a single binary operation .
The residuum after expressing the juice from fruits .
